problems.title: Print Even Numbers
problems.description:
Write a program to print all even numbers between 1 to n using a while loop.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print even numbers from 1 to n, each on a new line.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10

Sample Output
2
4
6
8
10

Explanation:
Even numbers between 1 and 10 are printed.
hintsList: Check if the counter is divisible by 2.
Increment the counter in a loop.
